name: Worm farm: Death eaters
description:
Developed for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

Source available at https://github.com/lyndoh/gdtv-22-game-jam

Death is only the beginning of dinner time!  Worms eat dead things. It's a simple block dropping puzzle game where the worms then turn the dropped blocks into worm compost. When the bulldozer comes along to ship lines of worm compost away you score points. Very basic and not as featured as I would have liked but happy I got something submitted at least for my first game jam!
